org.deeplearning4j.optimize

Class NeuralNetworkOptimizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.optimize.NeuralNetworkOptimizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    cc.mallet.optimize.Optimizable, cc.mallet.optimize.Optimizable.ByGradientValue, java.io.Serializable, NeuralNetEpochListener, OptimizableByGradientValueMatrix
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DenoisingAutoEncoderOptimizer, RBMOptimizer

    public abstract class NeuralNetworkOptimizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements cc.mallet.optimize.Optimizable.ByGradientValue, OptimizableByGradientValueMatrix, java.io.Serializable, NeuralNetEpochListener
    Performs basic beam search based on the network's loss function
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
